com.epoch.db

Class HWWrite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.HWWrite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssgtConstants

    public final class HWWrite
extends DBCommon
implements AssgtConstants
    Handles storage of assignments, including students' instantiations.

        hwId - assignment ID number
        oldQIds - ID numbers of the questions to be replaced

        private static void setHWPage1(Connection con,
                               Assgt newAssgt)
                        throws DBException,
                               NonExistentException,
                               SQLException
        Stores modification to assignment made on first (question-editing) page of assignment creation tool. Modifications may include: name, remarks, questions, groupings of questions for randomization, question dependencies, question points, allowed number of tries, permissible reaction conditions to be displayed.
        Parameters:
        con - database connection
        newAssgt - the modified assignment
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
        SQLException - if there's a problem writing to the database
        NonExistentException - if the assignment doesn't exist

      • deleteHWSets

        static void deleteHWSets(Connection con,
                         SQLWithQMarks hwIdsSql_vals)
                  throws DBException
        Removes a batch of assignments. Also removes dependencies of other assignments on this batch of assignments.
        Parameters:
        con - database connection with commitment already set
        hwIdsSql_vals - contains SQL of parenthesized unique ID of one assignment, to be substituted by the stored value, or parenthesized question marks, to be * substituted by the stored values
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • removeDependenciesOn

        private static void removeDependenciesOn(Connection con,
                                         int hwId)
                                  throws DBException
        Removes dependencies of other assignments on this assignment.
        Parameters:
        con - database connection with commitment already set
        hwId - unique ID of the assignment that others can no longer depend on
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • removeDependenciesOn

        private static void removeDependenciesOn(Connection con,
                                         SQLWithQMarks hwIdsSql_vals)
                                  throws DBException
        Removes dependencies of other assignments on this batch of assignments.
        Parameters:
        con - database connection with commitment already set
        hwIdsSql_vals - contains SQL describing one or more assignments that others can no longer depend on, plus values to substitute for the question marks in the SQL
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

                                             int hwId,
